item.description:
Features

  • Added customizable sound volume for break sound effects
  • Added option to configure notification display duration

Improvements

  • Added success message after license key entry
  • Removed BETA label from DeskRest Intelligence feature (video detection)
  • Enhanced break screen with improved animations
  • Added fade out animation for notifications
  • Added fade in animation for flash reminders
  • Improved fade in for break screen components
  • Added animation for the skip button state on the full break screen

Bugfix

  • Fixed issue where double-tapping Esc to skip breaks was not working reliably
  • Fixed issue where video detection state appeared during meetings
  • Fixed issue where flash reminders appeared while watching videos
